name: HTTP Injector Config File
summary: Learn about .EHI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HTTP Injector allows users to spoof their location and mask their identity while browsing the Internet, using an SSH connection and proxy servers. It also allows users to access websites that have been blocked by their ISP's firewall. As such, the app and the EHI files associated with it are popular in countries that restrict or monitor their populace's Internet access.

description: An EHI file is a config file used by Evozi HTTP Injector, an Android app that allows users to browse the Internet via a VPN. These files contain settings to configure HTTP Injector, including server login credentials and security/locking information.

instructions: To import an EHI config file into Evozi HTTP Injector:
Open the app and tap the file icon that appears near the app's upper right-hand corner.
Navigate to the folder containing your EHI file and select it.
